title: Roddick
description: I swore an oath to live and die by my club...And it's the club life that'll kill me. Or Baz's sweeter-than-candy little sister, Cherie, who's supposed to be hands off.There's an unspoken promise among brothers.The rules are simple. You don't sleep with another member's little sister.I might be the club president, but I don't play by any man's rules. I want her. And I'll have her.All. Night. Long.Forever.In my arms. In my bed. In my heart.She may be forbidden fruit, but she's got a cherry just for me.If you love dirty-talking heroes who love their MC as much as their women, one-click this instalove novella now.Roddick is a standalone MC Romance. The third book in the CAOS MC Series. No cliffhangers, no cheating, just kindle-melting happily ever afters!
author: K.B. Winters
